description:
Spirits` Diligence
his is the world of the spirits. The Early Education spirit and the Sentimental Education spirit are having a big battle in the public. Both parties try to get the Yutori spirit to join, but...
On the Way Home
On the way home from school, Bunji made up rules such as "If I can`t find a dog before I count to twenty, the world will explode!" He keeps thinking of things like that and panics!
Want to Be Happy
Today, late at night, the man in charge of publishing, Mr. Mizunuma, is waiting for Mom`s work. Mom is drawing. Dad comes in and talks about work and family and the men spend time talking to each other...
Happy
Today, Fumi is pouting. But actually, when Fumi was changing early in the morning, Mom said "Oh, you`re pouting." That`s what she randomly decided, so that`s why Fumi didn`t have a choice but to do so.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Path to Return / Spirits` Diligence / Want to Be Happy / Pleasant
精霊の政令 / かえり道 / 幸せになりたい / ごきげん
